main event: A civilian reported sighting a bright white pulsating light in Las Vegas, Nevada on November 27, 1967.
interesting points: The light was observed traveling from north to south at a velocity of 3 to 4 degrees per second,The duration of the sighting was about 2 to 3 seconds,There was no sound associated with the light,The report requested further information to evaluate the sighting,The sighting reportedly caused lights in an apartment to flicker.
witness description: female, 30, high school graduate, seems reliable
